info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A line of snow showers will affect Portage...Trumbull... northeastern Mahoning...Geauga...northern Medina...Cuyahoga...Lake... northern Summit...Lorain...Ashtabula and Crawford Counties Until 845 PM EDT.... At 718 PM EDT, radar indicated snow showers along a line extending from 8 miles north of Avon Lake to near Kinsman, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility dropping to less than three quarters of a mile... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Youngstown, Lorain, Elyria, Warren, Medina, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Meadville, Ravenna, Vermilion, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls and Euclid. Use extra caution if you must travel. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.
